captions.text: - The first thing you wanna do
is divide the Skittles along racial lines.
Once you have your Skittle lines,

you can use a credit card
to get them really straight,
it is time to put them into the bottle.
So pour some of the vodka out.
Give a toast to one of your damn hommies.

Todd, look both ways before
you cross the street,
OK, now put your Skittles in.
Be careful how many Skittles you put in
because if you over do it,
it's gonna be too soppy, OK.
Put the vodka you took out back in.
We gonna let these sit for about 24 hours,
but periodically you gotta shake them up.
And that helps the color to come out.

they leave behind a ton
of Skittle jizz, OK.
And that has to be cleaned out.
I can hear the jizz screaming right now.

add another bottle and
then we're going back in.
like this one's been filtered twice,
I can't just drink that just like that.
We gotta mix something with it.
- That was a solid freaking kamikaze.

comments.text:
+3martiniplaydate Quick tip: Avoid reusing plastic too much. I believe 
it'll start to break down and it'll 'taint' your liquid a bit. Use glass 
whenever you can not only because it's a bit safer and also because it 
looks nicer. :)
comments.author: S.J. Gray

comments.text:
Slanted shot glasses are not anything trippy, like aliens made them. 
They.re just shot glasses. You can also get shot glasses that have almost 
like a separater in the middle so half your shot is one color and the other 
side is another. They.re pretty cool. Now, at "participating" liquor 
stores, they have already made shot using the plastic version of the glass. 
I bought a couple out of curiosity and they were gross but I did buy more 
so I can use them for a party. So, if you see them and decide to try, you 
were warned! 🚽
